title: Explosives
summaries: Explosives are a placeable, consumable mechanism that can be triggered using wiring. Triggering them causes a large, circular explosion that covers a radius of ten tiles (up to 314 blocks total), destroying most placed blocks and items (except for explosion-proof items), and inflicting 500 base damage and a knockback of 10 (Extremely strong) to entities. Therefore, they can kill or severely damage even players with late-game gear.
Explosives can spawn naturally as traps wired to Pressure Plates, or wired to Detonators next to a vein of ores can be found in the Underground and Cavern layer.
